infos.value: ...Lady Glaciela. It is almost time to take the field.
...Right.
I will venture behind the castle to initiate a diversion.
Are you sure about this, Lady Miranda?
You are our guest from the East. Getting involved in our affairs like this...
Not to worry.
You have been a most cordial host to us outlanders, Lady Glaciela.
This battle is an ideal chance for me to return the favor. Alas...
If only Master were here as well...
Sir Seymore is still on the road, I take it?
Yes.
It could be that Rundall will finally declare war on Sadali.
Or perhaps he is inquiring into the current state of affairs...
So Rundall's invasion...has come at last.
If that is true, we have no time to spare in overthrowing Khury and conquering Wezette.
Lady Miranda... We will not get a second chanceâ€”we must win this battle.
I am aware.
However...there is no need to fight to the last if the battle seems lost.
I...do not want to lose any of you.
Lady Glaciela...
I must be off.
We will begin our assault behind the castle at sunrise.
And once the enemy has been drawn to your location, we will lay siege to the castle gates.
After that, we need only wait for Lord Mont to open the gates and allow our entry.
With all the pieces in place, our victory is all but assured.
Right.
Let us set out, shall we?
Hehehe. My dagger can hardly stay in its sheath!
